artist: Artist: Trevor Alixopulos; Publisher: Trevor Alixopulos
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic text and illustration of a donkey riding a nude man, printed on beige wove paper, collaged to maroon wove paper covers; 16 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink marker: howdy fly! / best from / ALIXOPULOS / 2006
title: Hut-Jack'd! And Other Annoying Stories by Alixopulos
